To copy static files to the public folder you need to create a custom webpack override.<\/p>

In order to modify the webpack config that comes in the Nullstack bundle, you can create a webpack.config.js<\/code> as mentioned in the documentation "How to customize Webpack"<\/a>.<\/p> 

// webpack.config.js<\/span>
const<\/span> [<\/span>server,<\/span> client]<\/span> =<\/span> require<\/span>(<\/span>"nullstack/webpack.config"<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>

const<\/span> fse =<\/span> require<\/span>(<\/span>"fs-extra"<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> CopyFiles<\/span> {<\/span>
  apply<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    fse.<\/span>copySync<\/span>(<\/span>"node_modules/swagger-ui-dist"<\/span>,<\/span> "public/api-docs"<\/span>,<\/span> {<\/span>
      overwrite<\/span>:<\/span> true<\/span>,<\/span>
    }<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>
}<\/span>

function<\/span> customServer<\/span>(<\/span>...<\/span>args<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
  const<\/span> config =<\/span> server<\/span>(<\/span>...<\/span>args)<\/span>;<\/span>
  config.<\/span>plugins.<\/span>push<\/span>(<\/span>new<\/span> CopyFiles<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  return<\/span> config;<\/span>
}<\/span>

module.<\/span>exports =<\/span> [<\/span>customServer,<\/span> client]<\/span>;<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>

In case you need to serve these files, you can use context.server<\/code> to create a route and express.static<\/code> to point to the files you want to serve.<\/p>

// server.js<\/span>
context.<\/span>server.<\/span>use<\/span>(<\/span>
  "/api-docs/"<\/span>,<\/span>
  express.<\/span>static<\/span>(<\/span>path.<\/span>join<\/span>(<\/span>__dirname,<\/span> ".."<\/span>,<\/span> "public/api-docs"<\/span>)<\/span>)<\/span>
)<\/span>;<\/span>
// ...<\/span>
<\/code><\/pre>
